source.author: Jobson, P.C.
source.title: Cucurbitaceae
source.in_title: Flora of Victoria. Vol. 3. Dicotyledons Winteraceae to Myrtaceae
source.citation: From: Jobson, P.C. (1996). Cucurbitaceae. In: Walsh, N.G.; Entwisle, T.J. (eds), Flora of Victoria. Vol. 3. Dicotyledons Winteraceae to Myrtaceae. Inkata Press, Melbourne.

leads.lead_text: Perennial; petiole scabrous; leaves hairy and coarsely scabrous below, coarsely scabrous above; margins of lamina lobes involute
Annual; petiole hairy; leaves hairy to coarsely hairy below, glabrescent to sparsely scabrous above; margins of lamina lobes flat
